entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing this evening. Hazy. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Hazy. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 18. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Clearing in the evening. Hazy. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 5 May 2023
